duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all school-based college staff, college office budget, and school leadership team meetings.
Execute and monitor systems for efficient college application process and codify all college application procedures.
Maintain systems for managing alumni counseling office and managing alumni rituals and traditions.
Build and maintain systems for managing summer programs and integrate benchmarks calendar with the school curriculum.
Oversee & manage the comprehensive 9 through 13 Foundations of Leadership curriculum and track progress of all college initiatives.
Manage and maintain a relationship with the College Board and evaluate SAT prep programs.
Ensure coordination and support of college initiatives in the school, execute targeted strategic college visits, and plan and execute Senior Signing Day.
Designate owners for each metric in the College and Alumni Report Card and track progress to reaching both monthly and end of year goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree; master’s degree preferred. At least 3 years of teaching experience with a record of high student achievement.
